title: Top US judges signal support for abortion limits
content: The court's eventual ruling may cut off abortion access for tens of millions of American women.

title: Top US judges signal support for abortion limits
content: The court's eventual ruling may cut off abortion access for tens of millions of American women.

title: Time to consider mandatory jabs, says EU chief
content: EU countries should discuss forced vaccinations to combat the Omicron variant, says Ursula von der Leyen.

title: Michigan school shooter charged as an adult
content: The 15-year-old killed four students in an "absolutely premeditated" attack, say prosecutors.

title: WTA suspends China tournaments over Peng Shuai
content: The WTA announces the immediate suspension amid concern for Chinese tennis player Peng Shuai.

title: Canadian MPs vote to ban LGBT 'conversion therapy'
content: MPs cross the aisle to shake hands with and even hug their counterparts as the bill is passed.

title: Disney elects woman as chairman for first time
content: Susan Arnold, who has been a board member for 14 years, will succeed Bob Iger at the end of the year.

title: Facebook uncovers China network behind fake expert
content: It deleted 500 accounts which amplified claims that the US was meddling in the Covid origins search.
